beer.beer_description: The Cherry Machine is our fresh, fruity, and festive take on a traditional Lichtenhainer. Dark cherry adds a sweet richness and depth to balance sour, smoky elements. We've used German noble hops for a subtle bitterness. The result is a beer that is both complex and approachable.

items.badge_description: Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 185 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 38!

Throughout history, you’ll find plenty of beer styles we do not commonly see anymore, but are without a doubt worthy of celebration. That's 5 beers in the Historical Beers style. Try 5 more for level 2.

items.badge_description: Hold on to your beers, unleash your inner paleontologist, and celebrate Untappd's 2025 Mid-Year in Beer presented by the Untappd Shop with this limited-edition badge. Now through July 18, get 50% OFF your first year of Insiders: GET THE DEAL

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 5 years on Untappd!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 135 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 28!

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 10 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 3.

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 105 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 22!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 205 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 42!

items.checkin_comment: Oooh, a lichtenhainer! You don't see that every day. Basically a smoked kettle sour. This one is nominally cherry flavour but as always with kettle sours they didn't put nearly enough adjunct into the thingo. The base beer is good though.

user.bio: Inner West brewery enthusiast and bon vivant. Currently favouring boozy grapefruity IIPAs.
